## EthersLiquityStoreOption type

Possible values for the optional [useStore](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquityconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) connection parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EthersLiquityStoreOption = "blockPolled";
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only supported value is `"blockPolled"`<!-- -->, in which case a [BlockPolledLiquityStore](./arth-lib-ethers.blockpolledliquitystore.md) will be created.
